At first, neither of the two reacted to that. But when the doorbell rang again, Bill finally shouted to his sister: "Hey Jen, check the door! I'm in the middle of a game here..."

"No, I'm not expecting anybody", his sister shouted back. "Check it yourself!"

"Damn, sister... I just can't interrupt right now... please!"

But his sister refused again: "No chance, brother... It's one of your geek friends anyway."

"No way! My buddies are all in the raid... Must be one of your lovers then!"

So none of them answered the door, until the doorbell began to ring for a third time, this time however continuing to ring loudly, until finally both siblings ran to check the door. But when they opened the door, they found an old, weazen man, clad into a black robe, with his face mostly hidden under a dark hood.

"WILLIAM AND JENNIFER MANSFIELD...", the old, dark man addressed the two teenagers with a voice, that hummed like a distant thunder, "I HAVE COME TO DELIVER A SPECIAL GIFT TO EACH OF YOU..." And with this, he suddenly raised his knobby hands and, with a fizzling crackling, two flashes of lightening shot from his fingers into their frozen bodies. "THREE WISHES EACH TO CONQUER THE UNIVERSE OR HEAL THE WORLD!" And after an evil chuckle, he added: "BUT CHOOSE WISELY, MY GRAND CHILDREN, AND WATCH YOUR WORDS! FOR YOU WON'T BE ABLE TO REVOKE WHATEVER YOU WILL HAVE WISHED... UNLESS YOU SPEND ANOTHER WISH."

And with this, the crackling and lightening and humming ceased - and the old man dissolved into a dark swarm of black bats, which quickly dispersed into all directions of the winds.

With unbelieving eyes, Bill and Jenny stared at each other...

18 year-old Bill and his 16 year-old nasty sister Jenny
each get three wishes from an evil spirit.

Now, which role do you want to play?
And how will you choose your wishes?

Don't hesitate to write your own chapters!
Just be creative, be thrilling, be nasty or friendly... and most of all: Have fun!
But please use proper grammar and spelling and no one-sentence-chapters!

Feel free to add more characters!
